update sys_division
DIV_NAME = #{divName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGER = #{manager,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DIV_PHONE = #{divPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRNT_ID = #{prntId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

MODIFYER = #{modifyer,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DIV_ICON = #{divIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where DIV_ID = #{divId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
